name: Tappy Fidget Spinner
description:
Tappy Fidget is a super addicting game that helps focus attention and relieve stress!

Tap to rotate the spinny circle to the correct color before the spinny fidget lands or it's GAME OVER. Tappy Fidget tests your reaction time and reflexes while allowing you to get into a soothing rhythm to relax and get into a deep zen trance.

Features free, addicting, minimalist gameplay with two different modes and keeps track of your progress to see how you are improving.

How to play:
> Tap to start
> Tap to rotate the spinny wheel to the color of the spinny fidget
> Repeat and improve!

Share your scores and tell your friends about the latest new fidgety simulator app!

How long can you last?
